arts.ttl: Al Ahli prepared to pay La Liga superstar’s €60m release clause
arts.sum: Al Ahli have been shopping in La Liga in recent months. They are leading candidates to sign Vinicius Junior, and now another top player is on their list of possible signings for 2025: Alex Baena. Baena has been one of La Liga’s standout performers over the last 18 months, and he has been an assist […] The post Al Ahli prepared to pay La Liga superstar’s €60m release clause appeared first on Football España.
